name: Kill Zombie - Snow City War
description:
Kill Zombie - Snow City War is a zombie shooting game that surpasses all other similar products. Dark colors create a sense of urgency for zombie siege! Go zombie hunting now and be the hunter master!
Features:
Escape & kill brain dead enemies in best sniper game!
Shoot down furious monster as real escape sniper shooter!
Rescue city survivors from homecoming zombies!
Thrilling action packed fps game of 2018!
Devise perfect zombie escape survival strategy!
